Source: NetflixDepending on who you ask, Netflix is well on its way to becoming the No.1 destination for all things television and film-related. In their latest foray in the reality TV lane, Twentysomethings: Austin has become the talk on social media. Operating under the premise of MTV’s The Real World format, Twentysomethings: Austin switches things up with a post-pandemic twist.

item.title: Beautiful no makeup quotes and sayings on natural beauty
item.description: Nothing comes in the way of a woman's beauty. However, the invention and widespread use of makeup has robbed the natural glamour that used to define a lady. All is not yet lost as there are still natural beauties out there who believe they are good-looking just the way they are. Well, that is true and so are the no makeup quotes and sayings about them. In the contemporary day and age, everyone is obsessed about their looks and the way social networks community will describe them.

item.title: Court Rules On Lawsuit Challenging Funke Akindele And Husband's Covid -19 Conviction
item.description: A Federal High Court in Lagos has struck out a suit seeking to dismiss the conviction of Funke Akindele and her husband JJCSkillz over the violation of Covid -19 lockdown regulations. Recall that the actress and her husband were convicted and sentenced to 14 days of community service by a Chief Magistrate Court sitting in Ogba on April 6, 2022. However, a Lagos lawyer, Olukoya Ogungbeje filed a suit which called into question the constitutionality of the Lagos State Infectious Diseases (Emergency Prevention) Regulations.

item.title: Did Tommy Fury Cheat on Molly-Mae? Here's What We Know
item.description: Molly-Mae and Tommy Fury Are Getting off the Island of Love as They Announce Their SplitMolly-Mae suspected Tommy Fury was cheating on her weeks before they got engaged. Now they've broken up. By Jennifer TisdalePublished Aug. 14 2024, 1:31 p.m. ET Source: Instagram/@tommyfuryIt seems like only yesterday that Love Island U.K. darlings Tommy Fury and Molly-Mae Hague met for the first time on the popular reality television show. Cast your hearts and minds back to June 2019 when Season 5 of the show had us thinking Tommy might end up with Lucie Donlan.

item.title: Breaking: Diego Maradona Is Dead
item.description: Football legend, Diego Maradona is dead after he suffered a cardiorespiratory arrest (heart attack) on Wednesday. The legendary Argentine footballer died on Wednesday morning local time in the town of Tigre at the age of 60 according to reports from local newspapers. The footballer recently had surgery to remove a blood clot from his brain, following a fall, Naija News recalls. During his playing days, Maradona was part of the Argentine team that won the World Cup in 1986.

item.title: Court Dismisses Fubaras Loyalists Bail
item.description: The bail applications filed by the loyalists of the Rivers State Governor, Siminalayi Fubara, who were linked with the state assembly explosion, have been dismissed by a Federal High Court in Abuja. Naija News reports that the defendants, namely Chime Eguma Ezebalike, Prince Lukman Oladele, Kenneth Goodluck Kpasa, Osiga Donald, and Ochueja Thankgod, were facing terrorism-related charges for their alleged involvement in the bombing of the Rivers State House of Assembly in October 2023.

item.title: How Jessie Holmes from 'Life Below Zero' Was Injured (Again)
item.description: Jessie Holmes from 'Life Below Zero' Injured After a Recent StormBy Callie (Carlos) CadornigaUpdated Oct. 5 2022, 1:42 p.m. ET Source: National GeographicThe harsh and harrowing nature depicted on Life Below Zero has no mercy. While the stars prepare as much as they can to flourish within dangerous natural conditions, there's only so much they can do to prepare for the struggle. Of course, if they ever suffer an injury, it makes it even that much harder.

item.title: The 'Fortnite' Spring Breakout Event Offers a Variety of New Challenges and Rewards

Source: Epic GamesSpring is in full swing, and Epic Games is celebrating the warmer weather with the Spring Breakout Fortnite event. This limited-time celebration has brought tons of new challenges to the popular battle royale, although you’ll only have until April 11 to join in on the fun.

item.title: What Was Dr. Michael Mosley's Cause of Death? Details

So, what happened to him? By Joseph AllenJun. 10 2024, Published 10:12 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesFollowing a days-long search, the body of British TV presenter Dr. Michael Mosley was found on a Greek island. Michael first went missing on June 5, 2024, after he went for a walk on Agios Nikolaos beach in Greece.

item.title: Kate Dies at the End of the 'Firefly Lane' Book, but What About in the Netflix Series?
item.description: The Netflix series follows the decades-long friendship of Kate and Tully based on book of the same name by Kristin Hannah. Does Kate die in the show? Source: NetflixSpoiler alert: This article contains spoiler for the Firefly Lane book and Netflix series. Netflix's original drama series Firefly Lane is an absolute tearjerker with elements of mystery, heartache, love, and the bond of an unbreakable friendship. Based on the novel by Kristin Hannah, Firefly Lane tells the story of the decades-long friendship between outgoing free spirit Tully Hart (Katherine Heigl) and introvert Kate Mularkey (Sarah Chalke).

item.title: ISWAP Claims Responsibility For Kuje Attack, Releases Video
item.description: The Islamic State in West Africa Province (ISWAP) on Wednesday night claimed responsibility for the attack on Kuje Prison in the Federal Capital Territory. Naija News had earlier reported that terrorists on Tuesday night invaded the facility and released not less than 600 prisoners. A further report had it that terrorists released members of their group during the attack. The terrorist sect in a video released on Wednesday night showed some of its men shooting their way into the facility.

item.title: John Sterling and His Ex-Wife Were Married for Over a Decade
item.description: Legendary Yankees Announcer John Sterling Was Married for 12 Years"As a little boy growing up in New York as a Yankees fan, I was able to broadcast the Yankees for 36 years," said John in his retirement. By Brandon CharlesApr. 17 2024, Published 9:34 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesA longtime New York Yankees radio announcer has stepped away from his dream job. After calling 5,420 regular-season games and 211 playoff games, John Sterling is no longer the play-by-play radio guy for the most popular team in baseball.

item.title: Sooner Or Later The Universe Will Serve You Revenge
item.description: In the post she shared on Instagram, Asiwaju told an unidentified individual that revenge is not in her plans, however, karma would catch up with the person. She opined that it is impossible to be trouble free after screwing with people’s life. She wrote, “Karma comes after everyone eventually. You can’t get away with screwing people over your whole life. What goes around comes around. That:s how it works. Sooner or later the universe will serve you the revenge that you deserve.

item.title: What Happened to Marcus From MrBeast? He Parted Ways With the YouTuber
item.description: Marcus Pearson from the MrBeast Crew was once a big part of the YouTube channel and adored by fans, but what happened to make him leave? It can be a chore to keep up with all of the internet drama surrounding social media stars. But if you were ever a fan of MrBeast on YouTube or his crew, then you might also be familiar with former member Marcus Pearson, who left back in 2020.

item.title: Why I Decided To Support Tinubu's Govt
item.description: A former spokesman of the defunct Atiku-Okowa Presidential Campaign Council, Daniel Bwala has stated that he does not regret joining the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) or supporting Atiku Abubakar. He, however, explained that due to the crisis in the nation, he has decided to focus on nation building rather than politicking. Bwala argued that an election can only hold in 2027 if the country is safe and secure. He stated this on Friday during an appearance on Arise TV’s Morning Show.

item.title: Like Amaechi, Timipre Sylva Gets Chieftaincy Title In Daura, Katsina
item.description: Nigeria’s Minister of State for Petroleum Resources, Timipre Sylva has been conferred a chieftaincy title in President Muhammadu Buhari‘s home state, Katsina. Naija News understands that the former Governor of Bayelsa State was conferred the title of ‘Sarkin Kudun Hausa’ by the Emir of Daura, Dr Faruk Umar Faruk. The development was confirmed in a letter personally signed and handed over to the minister by the Daura Emir when the Bayelsa man visited the monarch’s palace this weekend.

item.title: Louie Lopez - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Skateboarder sponsored by Volcom, Flip Skateboards, and Ricta. He placed 2nd at the Damn Am Costa Mesa Finals in 2013. Before Fame He became an official rider for Volcom jeans in 2006. Trivia He has been featured many times in Thrasher and Skateboarder magazines. Family Life He was born in Los Angeles, California and later moved to Hawthorne. Associated With He is friends with fellow pro skateboarders Luan Oliveira and David Gonzalez.

item.title: Man City Midfielder, Kevin De Bruyne, Signs Two-year Contract Extension Until 2025
item.description: Manchester City midfielder Kevin De Bruyne has signed a two-year contract extension that will keep him at the club until 2025. The Belgium international, whose existing deal was due to expire in 2023, is 30 in June and now looks set to see out most of the remainder of his career at the Etihad Stadium. De Bruyne has had a glittering spell since joining the club from Wolfsburg in 2015, winning seven major trophies, which could become 11 by the end of the season if City are successful in their hunt for a quadruple.

item.title: Sela Vave bio: Ethnicity, nationality, Jamie Foxx relationship, hot photos
item.description: Sela Vave is a household name in America having been a singer, model, actress and social media personality. She has been a part of almost all spheres of the entertainment industry. Her rise to fame was after being spotted with Jamie Foxx, but this does not in any way take from Vave’s talents because she is good at what she does. Jamie Foxx is an industry heavyweight who has been on the scene for years while Vave, on the other hand, started gaining fame the other day.

item.title: FG Speaks On Increasing Pump Price Of Petrol
item.description: The federal government has assured Nigerians it has no immediate plans to increase the pump price of petrol in the country. The Nigerian Midstream and Downstream Petroleum Regulatory Authority (NMDRA) in a statement on Friday made the disclosure, stating that there is adequate stock of petroleum products. The NMDRA statement follows panic in the market after members of the Independent Petroleum Marketers Association of Nigeria (IPMAN) raised an alarm that private depot owners had increased the price of petrol by N9 per litre.

item.title: Mwanawe William Kabogo yuko katika uhusiano na mjukuu wa Moi?
item.description: - Mwanawe aliyekuwa gavana wa Kiambu William Kabogo hivi majuzi aliweka picha mtandaoni akiwa na mjukuu wa Moi, Talisa - Wawili hao walikuwa wakiburudika England alikohamia Alvin Kabogo baada ya kufuzu kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Brighton - Talisa Moi anasemekana kusomea katika moja ya shule maarufu Brighton na mara kwa mara huburudika na mwanawe Kabogo Pesa huvutia pesa, kulingana na msemo nchini. Hivyo sio jambo la kushtua kwamba Alvin Kabogo, mwanawe aliyekuwa gavana wa Kiambu William Kabogo, na mjukuu wa Moi, Talissa huburudika pamoja.

item.description: - Mamlaka imeanzisha msako mkali dhidi ya mwanamme aliyempiga hadi kufa nyanya wa miaka 63 wakati wa mzozo kati ya familia mbili jirani - Mshukiwa, aliyetambulishwa kama Willis Oguma, anadaiwa kumgonga Syprose Oywa kwa kifaa butu kisogoni mwake, na kumuua papo hapo - Mambo yalienda arijojo wakati Oywa alijaribu kumwokoa mwanawe, David Ochieng', kutoka kwa wanaume watatu wenye hamaki waliomshambulia huku kukiwa na ugomvi kuhusu ua unaotenganisha boma zao

item.title: Politicians Responsible For Banditry In Kaduna State CAN Chairman
item.description: Kaduna State chapter chairman of the Christian Association of Nigeria (CAN), Rev John Joseph Hayab, has asserted that some politicians were indirectly responsible for the continued banditry activities in the state. According to him, political officeholders have caused disunity among citizens of the state and the country at large. Naija News reports that Hayab said this on Friday at a one-day roundtable on religion and politics in Kaduna. The cleric maintained that politicians were fomenting division in society by poisoning the minds of peace-loving people with bigotry.

item.title: Wetang'ula na Mudavadi hawataki kumuona DP Ruto, adai wamenizimia simu
item.description: - Naibu Rais William Ruto aliwaomba wakazi wa eneo la Magharibi mwa Kenya kuwaambia Mudavadi na Wetang'ula kupokea simu zake - Hata hivyo, Mbunge wa Sirisia John Waluke alijaribu kuelezea sababu za wawili hao kupuuza simu za Ruto - Waluke alisema wawili hao walimumunya pesa za Ruto na kisha kukimbilia katika mrengo mwingine Habari Nyingine: Ruto akataa ombi la kumuunga mkono Mudavadi kuwania urais 2022 Naibu Rais William Ruto amelalama kuwa Musalia Mudavadi na Moses Wetang'ula wamekataa kupokea simu zake.

item.title: Bungoma: Manzi amfurusha lofa waliyetengana
item.description: Wakazi wa eneo la Lugulu, kaunti ya Bungoma walijionea sinema ya bwerere baada ya mrembo kumfukuza jamaa aliyemfuata kwao licha yao kutengana. Semasema za mtaani ziliarifu kuwa wawili hao walikuwa wameona kwa muda lakini kutokana na mizozo ya mara kwa mara katika ndoa mrembo aliamua kurejea nyumbani kwa wazazi wake. Habari Nyingine: Wauguzi 15 wa hospitali ya Pumwani wanasa COVID-19 Hata hivyo, Taifa Leo iliripoti kwamba baada ya siku tano lofa aliamua kumfuata mrembo kwao akinuia kumrejesha pendoni.

item.title: Clue Heywood's Satirical Peloton Tweets Have the Whole Internet Ridiculing the 1 Percent
item.description: A Man's Satire of Peloton's Ads Highlights Their Out-of-Touch MarketingBy Pippa RagaUpdated Jan. 29 2019, 1:13 p.m. ET Source: Peloton/TwitterIf you’re committed to the fitness life (hey, it’s still January — don’t give up on your resolutions just yet), chances are you might have come across ads for Peloton, a stationary bike with a tablet that allows you to take live" spin classes at the tap of a screen. They also make a treadmill that offers live running and bootcamp classes.

item.title: Nairobi County to spend KSh 100 million to deal with stray dogs menace
item.description: - County director of veterinary services Murithi Muhari said the county had at least 50, 000 stray dogs - The World Animal Protection report indicated 73% of city residents were not aware of dog vaccination services indicating most of the canines were dangerous - The report further revealed 53% of dog owners believe dogs are meant to freely roam around at night without restriction City Hall has announced plans to spend KSh 100 million taxpayer's money to eliminate stray dogs in Nairobi county.

item.title: Oliver Lanning - Age, Family, Bio
Olusanya Appointed As First Female GTBank Managing Director
item.description: Miriam Olusanya has been appointed as the new Managing Director of Guaranty Trust Bank (GTBank). Naija News reports that this was made known in a notice signed by the company’s secretary, Erhi Obebeduo, to the Nigerian Exchange Group Limited (NGX). Recall that during the bank’s investor earnings in September 2020, the former MD Segun Agbaje disclosed that the bank was looking for a new MD. He said five of the bank’s Executive Directors were in line for the top job and were at the concluding stages of the recruitment process.

item.title: Is Magnolia Network Replacing DIY? Inside the Upcoming Channel
item.description: Is Magnolia Network Replacing DIY Network? Inside the Gaines' New ChannelBy Samantha Faragalli YounghansUpdated April 27 2020, 5:28 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIf you're a fan of Chip Gaines and Joanna Gaines, then it's likely you've heard of their upcoming network, Magnolia Network. The new TV channel is a project that the HGTV stars have been working on for quite some time, and even though the two have successfully accomplished a lot of awesome things over the years, this is arguably their most exciting venture yet.

Mugumo ulio na miaka 80 waanguka ukiangalia Mlima Kenya!

item.title: NCIC summons Kikuyu musician Muigai Wa Njoroge over hard-hitting song scolding Uhuru
item.description: - Muigai Wa Njoroge's Ino Migunda song rebuked President Uhuru Kenyatta's government largely because of the Kariabangi demolitions and corruption - The cohesion commission summoned him over the song which it said posed a threat to public harmony - The musician was asked to appear before the commission on Friday, June 26, failure to which he would be cited for contempt The National Cohesion and Integration Commission (NCIC) has summoned renowned Kikuyu musician Muigai Wa Njoroge over a controversial song that castigated President Uhuru Kenyatta's government.

item.title: Are They Not Going To Be Paid? Wike Defends Appointment Of 50,000 Political Advisers
item.description: The Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike on Friday defended his decision to appoint 50,000 political advisers a few months before he leaves office. Speaking during a live chat with journalists at the government house in Port Harcourt which was monitored by Naija News correspondent, Wike said the move is part of efforts by his administration to alleviate poverty among the people of Rivers State and create more jobs. The Rivers State Governor added that he is not done and the number will still be increased to 100,000.

item.title: BBNaija Kiddwayas Sister Throws Dancing Skills In Hijab
item.description: A young Nigerian Muslim girl has stirred hilarious reactions on social media after she appeared in a viral video dancing with Hijab and skirt at a Tecno mobile Black Friday special activation event. Netizens in their reactions to the young girl’s dancing skills compared her with former Big Brother Naija housemate and billionaire son, Kiddwaya. Although, there is no connection in whatever way between the girl and Kiddwaya, Nigerians on social media linked the BBNaija reality star’s style of dance to the young girl’s dance steps.

item.title: Big Brother Nigeria Season Six Returns [See Details]
item.description: Popular Nigerian reality television show Big Brother Naija (BBNaija) will return for its sixth edition in 2021. Naija News reports that the organizers of the show – Multichoice Nigeria – also announced a grand prize of N90 million. MultiChoice Nigeria, on Wednesday, March 24, announced that it is offering customers on its DStv and GOtv platforms the opportunity to be among the first to be auditioned for the sixth season of the Big Brother Naija reality show.

item.title: Grace Onyango ni Chuma, Alipambana na Wanaume na Kuwa Mwanamke wa Kwanza Meya na Mbunge
item.description: Grace ndiye meya wa kwanza wa kike sio tu huko Kisumu bali pia nchini Kenya 1955 alihitimu kutoka Chuo cha Mafunzo ya Ualimu cha Vihiga na akatumwa Ng’iya Girls (shule yake ya zamani) kuwa mwalimu na baadaye akawa mkufunzi chuo cha VihigaAkiwa diwani, wenzake walivutiwa sana naye hivi kwamba walimshawishi kugombea kiti cha meya wakati Ondieki alipofariki dunia mnamo 1955Alishinda kiti hicho licha ya kuwapo ushindani mkubwa kutoka kwa wanaumeGrace Monica Akech Onyango alizaliwa mnamo mwaka wa 1924 kwa familia ya watoto wanane, katika eneo la Sakwa, Kaunti ya Siaya.

item.title: Allow Your Son To Organise Rally In Anambra Or Quit Presidential Race, Keyamo Challenges Peter Obi
item.description: The Spokesperson for the All Progressives Congress (APC) Presidential Campaign Council, Festus Keyamo, has challenged the Presidential candidate of the Labour Party (LP), Peter Obi, on organizing a well-coordinated campaign rally. Naija News reports that youths in the ruling party on Saturday held a solidarity rally for the presidential candidate of the APC, Bola Ahmed Tinubu. The rally, tagged ‘Eko Youth Walk’ and organised by the son of the APC presidential candidate, Seyi Tinubu, was held at Police College, Ikeja GRA.

item.title: Bungoma: Mapasta 3 wakamatwa huku waumini wakikimbilia usalama wao kwa kuandaa ibada
item.description: - Mapasta hao walikuwa wa makanisa ya Apostolic Faith Ministries, Repentance and Holiness na Jevohah Witness - Mmoja wao alikuwa amewakusanya waumini wake katika nyumba moja lakini alinaswa na maafisa wa polisi - Mwingine aliwaambia polisi kuwa alitaka tu kukusanya sadaka kutoka kwa waumini Mapasta watatu kutoka makanisa tofauti katika Kaunti ya Bungoma walinaswa na polisi baada ya kukiuka sheria za serikali za kupigwa marufuku kwa ibada kufuatia kuzuka kwa virusi vya corona.

item.title: Jamia Mosque says it won't reopen, terms 100 people per service impractical
item.description: - Jamia Mosque had envisioned it would reopen for physical prayers on July 14 following consultations with inter-faith council - Its committee noted the facility was located within the Central Business District thus it would be impractical to limit number of people - Places of worship were closed in March when the government announced ban on all forms of gathering to prevent spread of coronavirus There shall no be prayers at the Jamia Mosque in Nairobi after its top leadership quashed plans to reopen for physical services.

item.title: Kiernan Shipka - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Child star known for portraying Sally Draper, Don and Betty Draper's daughter, on the hit AMC series Mad Men. She starred in the independent teen comedy Fan Girl in 2015. She was then cast as the titular character in Chilling Adventures of Sabrina, a reboot of Sabrina the Teenage Witch in 2018. Before Fame She began modeling in commercials as a baby. Trivia She was nominated as Best Supporting Young Actress for a Young Artist Award in 2011 for her role on Mad Men.

item.title: Police Arrest Three Over Beheading Of Woman In Adamawa Hotel
item.description: The Adamawa State Police Command has confirmed the arrest of three individuals linked to the shocking murder of Bilkisu Alhaji Idi, a woman found beheaded at the Happy Day Quest Inn Hotel in Yola North Local Government Area. The Police Public Relations Officer, SP Suleiman Yahaya Nguroje, announced the detention of Offa Jacob and Yifarta Caleb, receptionists at the hotel, and Habibu Isah, a security guard. The arrests came after the gruesome discovery on January 18, 2024, which has since sent shockwaves through the community.

item.title: Audu Abubakar Confirmed Dead, Buried Amid Tears In Kogi
item.description: Contrary to earlier reports that Abubakar Audu, the governorship candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in last week's election is alive, Premium Times has confirmed that he has been buried. This all but quells reports that the former governor had been resurrected by a prophet who came in from Lagos to pray for him. The social media had been awash with the report about the possible resurrection of the late politician, but Premium Times have confirmed that he has since been buried and sympathisers have left the grave side but there are still tears in the compound.

item.title: John Legend - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: R&B singer and pianist who scored his first big hit with the 2005 single "Ordinary People." He has collaborated with acclaimed artists, such as Jay-Z and Kanye West. In 2018, he made history as the first black man to win an EGOT award for his role as a producer on the musical Jesus Christ Superstar Live. Before Fame He graduated as the salutatorian of North High School and was accepted into several Ivy League schools.

item.title: Kane - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Glenn Thomas Jacobs became known to WWE audiences for his iconic black and red mask while playing The Undertaker's half-brother, Kane. Before Fame He was born into a US Air Force family in Torrejon de Ardoz, Madrid, but raised in Missouri. Before entering the field of wrestling, he played both basketball and football in college for Northeast Missouri State University. Trivia He adopted the Tombstone Piledriver move from The Undertaker and furnished his signature move, the Chokeslam, in the WWE ring.

item.title: Emirates Cuts Nigerian Flights Over $85m Blocked Funds
item.description: United Arab Emirates (UAE) carrier, Emirates has said that it will be reducing the number of times it frequents Nigeria from 11 to 7 per week. This is due to the inability to repatriate funds from sales of tickets. Naija News reports that the Nigerian government has been under pressure due to blocked funds belonging to foreign airlines which have hit over $500m. Emirates alone have $85m trapped funds. In a letter dated July 22, addressed to the Minister of Aviation, Senator Hadi Sirika, the Emirates, explained they had to take the action to cut down the continued losses Emirates is experiencing as a result of funds being blocked in Nigeria.

item.title: Kenyans concerned COVID-19 vaccines could disappear like Jack Ma's donations: "It's the same gov't"
item.description: - Government officials led by Health CS Kagwe received the first batch of COVID-19 vaccines and they pledged to take care of the jabs - However, Kenyans did not believe a word they said going by the concerns that some of them raised on social media - A section of Kenyans felt since the same government was accused of misappropriating Jack Ma's donations, the arrival of COVID-19 vaccines could be the beginning of another scandal

Special Agent Jane Tennant (Vanessa Lachey) and Computer Specialist Ernie Malik (Jason Antoon) are brought in to help the team clear Alden Parker's (Gary Cole) name after the Season 19 finale left his innocence and whereabouts up in the air.

item.description: - Road users on Thika road were stuck in traffic for hours after patients escaped Mathari hospital - Over 100 mental patients escaped the hospital as doctors and nurses kick off nationwide strike - A major manhunt has been launched in search of the mental patients There was drama along Thika Road today, December 5 after mental patients escaped from Mathari Hospital in Nairobi. item.title: Profile Of New Olu Of Warri
item.description: The new Olu of Warri, Ogiame Atuwatse III, was born on April 2, 1984, in Warri to the late Godwin Toritseju Emiko, the 20th Olu of Warri, Ogiame Atuwatse II, and Gladys Durorike Emiko. King Tshola Emiko attended the NNPC Primary School in Warri for his primary education and later Adesoye College in Offa, Kwara State for his secondary education between 1995 and 2001. From there, the monarch proceeded to Case Western Reserve University, Cleveland, Ohio in the United States where he obtained a Bachelor of Arts between 2002 and 2006, majoring in International Studies and Political Science with a minor in History and Economics.

item.title: Sunday Igboho Begs, Apologizes To Ooni Of Ife (Video)
item.description: Yoruba activist, Chief Sunday Adeyemo, better known as Sunday Igboho has apologized to the Ooni of Ife, Oba Adeyeye Enitan Ogunwusi over his recent outburst against the first class traditional ruler. Naija News recalls that Sunday Igboho had claimed the Ooni disappointed the Yoruba people when he visited President Muhammadu Buhari over the herdsmen crisis. He had described the Ooni of Ife, Oyo State Governor, Seyi Makinde, and the national leader of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Asiwaju Bola Tinubu, as Fulani slaves.

item.title: Super Eagles Players Fail To Make It Into 2023 AFCON Group Stage Best XI
item.description: No Super Eagles of Nigeria player made it into the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) group stage Best XI. The 2023 AFCON group stage best XI was issued by football analytics website, Whoscored.com, a day after the conclusion of the tournament’s group stage campaign. The players that competed in at least two of the competition’s group stage games made up Whoscored’s Best XI; on the shortlist were players from Equatorial Guinea, Ghana, Morocco, Egypt, Angola, Cape Verde, Tunisia, Senegal, and Mauritania.

item.description: Model on Instagram who became best known for posting lingerie, swim wear and fashionista photos of herself. She has accrued more than 3.4 million followers. item.title: APC Is Ready To Donate Tinubu To Unify PDP Keyamo
item.description: The Minister of State for Labour and Employment, Festus Keyamo, has pitched in on the crisis rocking the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP. Naija News reports the PDP have been in a turbulent state after it’s presidential primaries which produced Atiku Abubakar as it’s flag bearer. The party erupted into crisis when Atiku opted for Governor Ifeanyi Okowa of Delta State as his running mate. Rivers state governor, Nyesom Wike, who had claimed that the primaries were manipulated to favor Atiku, called for the resignation of the party’s national chairman, Iyorchia Ayu, for peace to be returned to the party.

item.title: Nigerians React As Mr Ibu Lands In Hospital On Marriage Anniversary
item.description: Veteran actor, John Ikechukwu Okafor, popularly known as Mr Ibu has been hospitalized. His wife, Stella Maris Okafor took to her social media account on the 25th of May to announce that it is their anniversary. However her husband was presently in the hospital. She wrote: “Hello my beautiful people, by this time last year 25th may my wedding anniversary my husband was admitted in the hospital today again 25th may he is in the hospital but I give God all the glory happy wedding anniversary to us @realmribu1 I can’t kill myself is well” Reacting to the unfortunate incident, Nigerian’s wished the actor a speedy recovery.

item.title: June 5 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: The Gemini sign is ruled by the planet Mercury, but because you were born in the second Decan, or part of the sign, you are also influenced by the planet Venus. Your personality is comprised of Mercury's influence on the agile, intellectual mind and Venus's sociable and harmonizing qualities. Together, these two influences create your effective charm. A completely social creature, interacting in a group setting is key to your happiness.

item.title: Kemi Adeosun Resigns As Nigeria's Finance Minister
item.description: Nigeria’s Minister of Finance, Kemi Adeosun has reportedly resigned her position in President Buhari’s cabinet. It is not clear yet when her resignation letter was submitted but Naija News gathered her resignation is as a result of the allegations surrounding her National Youth Service Corps, NYSC, certificate. Finance minister, Kemi Adeosun resign over allegations of NYSC certificate forgery. — Hamzat B. Lawal {Etim} (Hamzy!) ?? (@HamzyCODE) September 14, 2018 The minister had been under pressure to resign since the allegations concerning her fake NYSC certificate broke to the public.

item.title: Miyetti Allah Takes Position On 2023 Presidency Zoning, Tells Buhari To Declare Bandits As Terrorist
item.description: The Miyetti Allah Kautal Hore has taken a position on the zoning of the 2023 presidential ticket. According to it, zoning is not a democratic process and should not be a factor in deciding the person who takes over from President Muhammadu Buhari in 2023. The Bauchi State Chapter of the group made the submission on Sunday through its chairman, Alhaji Sadik Ibrahim Ahmad. Also, the group urged the federal government to heed calls from several quarters and declare bandits as terrorists, noting that declaring the bandits as terrorists is the right thing for the government to do in order to curb the ugly trend of insecurity.

item.title: Peter Obi Has Little Experience, Can't Lead Nigeria Okowa
item.description: Delta State Governor, Ifeanyi Okowa has watered down the administrative experience of Labour Party presidential candidate, Peter Obi, saying he can’t lead Nigeria at the moment. Okowa who is the vice presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) said Obi’s only experience is as a former Governor in Anambra State is not enough to lead Nigeria. He stressed that leading a country like Nigeria is hard and hence someone like Obi needed more to occupy the seat of the presidency.

item.description: The Spokesperson of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) Presidential Campaign Council, Dino Melaye, has reacted to the workout video of the presidential candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu. Naija News had reported that Tinubu in the video released via his Twitter handle on Sunday, denied reports that he has withdrawn from the 203 presidential race. In a statement released alongside the video, Tinubu stated that he is strong, healthy and ready to serve Nigerians from day one in office.

item.title: Saraki, Dogara travel to meet Buhari
item.description: The Senate president, Bukola Saraki and the speaker of the House of Representatives, Yakubu Dogara, have departed for London to meet President Muhammadu Buhari. Channels TV, citing a source at the National Assembly, reports that Saraki and Dogara traveled to London on Wednesday morning, February 15, to meet with President Buhari who is currently on holidays in the UK. Yusuf Lasun who is the deputy speaker of of the House is also expected to join the group visiting the president.

item.title: Tinubu Submits FCTA 2024 Budget To Reps
item.description: President Bola Tinubu on Tuesday submitted the 2024 budget for the Federal Capital Territory Administration to the House of Representatives for consideration and passage. The estimates of the budget, however, was not disclosed when the President’s letter seeking the passage of the budget which was read on the floor of the House during the plenary session. The letter reads, “In line with the provisions of sections 121 and 299 of the Constitution of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, 1999, the Honourable Minister of the Federal Capital Territory has prepared the 2024 budget proposal of the FCT which is here before you for the consideration and approval by the National Assembly.

item.title: Burna Boy Receives Early Birthday Surprise On Stage In Netherlands
item.description: Nigerian Afrobeats singer, Damini Ebunoluwa Ogulu, popularly known as Burna Boy, has received an early birthday surprise from his family in the Netherlands. Naija News reports that the Grammy-award-winning singer, who had last month canceled his concert in Netherlands turns 32 today, July 2nd, 2023. The video sighted online, captured the moment Burna Boy’s mother, alongside other people suspected to be members of his family and fans surprised him on the stage.

item.title: FG Announces Resumption Of Abuja-Kaduna Train Services
item.description: The Federal Government on Monday announced that Abuja-Kaduna train services will resume before the end of November 2022. Recall that the Nigerian Railway Corporation put hold its services on the route in March this year following an attack by dreaded terrorists. Naija News reports that gun-wielding terrorists about eight months ago attacked a moving passenger train heading to Kaduna, and killed and kidnapped scores of passengers. The assailants subsequently released the captives in batches.

item.title: How Far Does Devin Get on The Bachelorette? (SPOILERS)

item.title: Frank Mba Hands Over To Olumuyiwa Adejobi As Force PRO, Proceeds On Course
item.description: There has been a change in the baton at the Police Public Relations Department as CP Frank Mba has handed over the duties and responsibilities of the Force Public Relations Department to his Deputy, CSP Olumuyiwa Adejobi. According to a statement on Saturday from the Police Force, the change takes immediate effect. The Police statement signed by SP Benjamin Hundeyin, an admin officer at the Force Public Relations Department, Force Headquarters Abuja added that Mba will now proceed on a Senior Executive Course at the National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies (NIPSS), Kuru, Jos.

item.title: Take A Bow And Go
item.description: The Rivers State House of Assembly, on Wednesday, ordered the nine commissioners who resigned their positions to ‘take a bow and go.’ On Monday, the parliament led by the Speaker, Martin Amaewhule, invited the commissioner-nominees for screening as part of the 8-point peace agenda signed following a meeting with President Bola Tinubu in Abuja. The nominees are: Zacchaeus Adangor, ⁠Dr. Jacobson Mbina, Dr. Gift Worlu, Mrs Inime Chinwenwo- Aguma, ⁠Engr. Chukwuemeka Woke.

item.title: Anthony Joshua Sure Of Winning Whyte In August
item.description: Nigerian-born British heavyweight boxer, Anthony Joshua is convinced he will win his rematch with Dillian Whyte on August 12. When questioned about their previous fight in 2015, which Joshua won by seventh-round knockout, the two-time world heavyweight champion recalled Whyte’s strong left hook. AJ admitted that he missed the hook because he was too concentrated on assaulting Whyte to notice the counter. The thundering left hook stunned him to his core, leaving him with a memory that continues to motivate him to this day.

item.title: Boko Haram Gets New Commander After Death Of Shekau
item.description: The dreaded Boko Haram terrorist group has reportedly chosen a new leader after the death of their charismatic leader, Abubakar Shekau. The new leader and commander has been identified as Bakura Modu, also known as Sahaba. The status of leadership is believed to have been conferred on Sahaba based on an undated video released by the terrorist group in which Boko Haram shows Modu flanked by many armed fighters in a formation as he addresses the camera, in what is traditionally a jihadist group’s way of presenting a new leader.

item.title: INEC Speaks On FCT Special Status In Final Address Before Tribunal
item.description: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) on Tuesday in its final written address on the petition filed by the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) and its presidential candidate, Atiku Abubakar said the FCT has no special status. Counsel to INEC, Abubakar Mahmoud noted that in line with section 134 of the constitution, the FCT is treated as a state, in essence, there are 37 states in the country. Mahmoud said the petitioners have failed woefully in establishing their petition hence, their request should be dismissed by the tribunal.

NCDC Confirms 796 New COVID-19 Cases In Nigeria
item.description: The Nigeria Center for Disease Control (NCDC) on Friday evening, 11th December 2020, confirmed 796 new cases of Coronavirus disease infection in Nigeria. The new cases of COVID-19 infection were confirmed via a statement on the official Twitter handle of the health agency. This brings the total number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in Nigeria to 72,140 which includes 65,722 discharged cases and 1,190 deaths. Below is the breakdown of the latest cases according to states with Abuja, the Federal Capital Territory having the highest number of cases, followed by Lagos State.

item.description: The first lady of Nigeria, Mrs Patience Jonathan visited Akure, Ondo state today and some of the things she said might interest you! It was made known that Patience Jonathan, who's on a 'Women Rally' was in Akure today and while addressing Ondo women, she said she is a daughter and a fan of former first lady, late Maryam Babangida. Mrs Jonathan also advised the youths of Ondo to pursue their education, stressing that if she wasn't educated, she wouldn't be a first lady;

item.title: Ilorin High Court Convicts Six Students For Internet Fraud
item.description: The Federal High Court in Ilorin, Kwara State, has convicted six students over alleged involvement in internet fraud. Naija News understands that this marks the second occasion in just two days that the court has convicted six individuals for cyber fraud in the state capital. The convicted individuals were among the 50 suspects apprehended during a sting operation conducted by the EFCC in February. This group consisted of 48 students from Kwara State University (KWASU) and two residents of Malete.

item.description: An All Progressives Congress (APC) youth leader has been reportedly killed by a yet-to-identified group of hoodlums in a community in Enugu State. item.title: APC's Abiru Wins Lagos East Senatorial Bye-election (See Final LGA Results)
item.description: The candidate of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in the Lagos East Senatorial bye-election, Tokunbo Abiru, has emerged winner of the poll held on Saturday. Naija News reports that Abiru was announced the winner by the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC). Abiru polled a total of 89,204 votes while Babatunde Gbadamosi of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) secured 11,257 votes, leaving a margin of 77,947 votes. Abiru defeated his opponent by a wide margin in all the five local government areas in the senatorial district.

item.title: Buhari Reluctantly Endorsed Ize-Iyamu - Obaseki
item.description: Governor Godwin Obaseki of Edo State has stated that President Muhammadu Buhari was pressured into endorsing Pastor Osagie Ize-Iyamu for the Edo gubernatorial election. Naija News reports that President Buhari on Friday presented the flag of the All Progressives Congress (APC) to Ize-Iyamu ahead of the September 19 governorship election. Reacting in a statement on Friday titled ‘We sympathise with Buhari’s dilemma in endorsing Ize-Iyamu Osagie’, Crusoe Osagie, Special Adviser on Media and Communication Strategy to Obaseki, said it was disappointing that Buhari endorsed Ize-Iyamu who is facing corruption charges to the tune of N700m.

item.title: Minister Of Education, Adamu Admits He Failed
item.description: Nigeria’s Minister of Education, Mallam Adamu Adamu, admitted he failed in his official duties as he could not deal with several challenges that drastically affected the educational system in the last few years. Adamu, while speaking on Thursday at the 66th National Council on Education (NCE) in the Federal Capital Territory, Abuja reflected on the challenges he faced as Education Minister, having occupied the office longer than any other person.

item.title: Raila Hakunidai Chochote Wakati wa Handisheki, Rais Uhuru Asema
item.description: - Rais alisema kuwa handisheki ya 2018 ilipania kuleta amani baada ya uchaguzi wa 2017 uliokumbwa na mvutano - Tangu wakati huo, Uhuru na Raila wamekuwa na uhusiano mwema huku baadhi ya wachaangzui wa siasa na wanaowakosoa wakisema agenda yao kuu ini 2022 - Uhuru na Raila walikuwa miongoni mwa wageni wa heshima katika maadhimisho wa 58 na Madaraka Dei Rais Uhuru Kenyatta kwa mara nyingine tena amesema salamu za maridhiano za 2018 baina yake na kinara wa Upinzani Raila Odinga hazikuwa na mengine ila kuleta amani.

item.title: Senate Asked To Reject Buharis Nominations For INEC Commissioners
item.description: The Senate has been asked to reject the 19 nominees for the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) Residential Electoral Commissioners. Naija News recalls that President Muhammadu Buhari had in July asked the Senate toconfirm 19 nominees as INEC Commissioners. Speaking during an appearance on Channel Television on Monday night, Executive Director of YIAGA Africa, Samson Itodo, rejected the nominees for INEC RECs. He claimed that the nominations were an attempt by the All Progressives Congress (APC) government to capture INEC for political gain ahead of the 2023 general elections.

item.title: Senate To Screen Acting CJN, Justice Ariwoola On Wednesday
item.description: The 9th Senate led by Senate President, Ahmad Lawan will screen the acting Chief Justice of Nigeria, Justice Olukayode Ariwoola on Wednesday. Lawan disclosed this while addressing Senators during plenary following their resumption from their annual summer recess. Recall that President Muhammadu Buhari on the 25th of June, 2022 swore in Ariwoola as acting CJN following the resignation of former CJN, Justice Ibrahim Tanko Muhammad. According to the Senate President, lawmakers on Wednesday will also work on the Medium Term Expenditure Framework/Fiscal Strategy Paper (MTEF/FSP) 2023 – 2025, Budget 2023, and work to support the defence and security forces of the country.

item.title: Top Nigerian Newspaper Headlines For Today, Thursday, 22nd February, 2024

Making this remark after meeting with President Bola Tinubu at the presidential villa on Wednesday, Gowon acknowledged that criticism of the administration was usual, but he encouraged Nigerians to give the president adequate time to address economic difficulties.

item.title: Two Soldiers Dead, Two Injured As Nigerian Army Kills Four IPOB/ESN Fighters During Gun Battle In An
item.description: There were casualties when troops of the Nigerian Army and fighters of the Indigenous Peoples of Biafra/Eastern Security Network engaged in a gun battle in Anambra State. A statement on Wednesday by the Director of Army Public Relations, Brigadier General Onyema Nwachukwu revealed that the clash happened when the troops moved to stop the IPOB/ESN fighters from enforcing an illegal sit-at-home order in Ihiala town of Anambra. He narrated that following a distress call, the troops responded to restore normalcy in the area but the IPOB/ESN fighters engaged them in a serious gun battle.

item.title: Sudanese Nursing Mother, Sentenced To Death For Apostasy, To Be Freed
item.description: A Sudanese court ordered the release of a 27-year-old nursing mother, who was on death row for abandoning Islam, BBC reports. The news was spread by the official Suna news agency on June 23, 2014, Monday. Convict’s lawyer, Elshareef Ali, has also confirmed this development: Meriam Yahya Ibrahim Ishag was pregnant when a Sharia court in Sudan sentenced her to death by hanging for abandoning her faith. The execution was delayed for about two years in order to allow her to give birth and to nurse the baby.

item.title: Did the Real-Life James Herriot Go to War?
item.description: James Alfred Wight, better known by his pen name James Herriot was a British veterinary surgeon who lived through WWII. Did he go to war? Veterinarian James Herriot proposes to his love interest in PBS Masterpieces' All Creatures Great and Small, but the threat of war looms, which frightens fans. The eventual author from Sunderland, England graduated from vet school in 1939, the year WWII began. So far, the show depicts his years from 1939 to 1941, working at a rural vet clinic and how he gave up a good job in Glasgow to stay with the community to be close to Helen (real name Joan Danbury).

item.title: Insecurty: I'm Not Afraid Of Dying, I've Written My Will
item.description: Benue Governor, Samuel Ortom has disclosed that he is not afraid of dying for the people of the state, adding that he has already prepared his will. Governor Ortom expressed confidence that his family will not fight over his properties if he is eventually assassinated by bandits ravaging his state. Ortom, a staunch critic of President Muhamadu Buhari, stated that the high rate of insecurity in the country is worrisome and needs urgent attention before the 2023 general elections.

item.title: Who Did Dale Allegedly Cheat on Clare With? Inside 'The Bachelorette' Breakup

Following Dale's announcement that The Bachelorette couple had broken up, rumors began circulating that Dale was cheating on Clare with another woman. It's only been a little over two months since the engagement between Dale and Clare went public.

Trivia He had the unique distinction of being the featured referee in the WWE '12 and WWE '13 video games. Family Life He married Amy Robinson on October 11, 2000, but she passed away two years later. Associated With He was trained by wrestling icon Ric Flair in 1993.

item.title: Tinubu Reveals Ways To Move Nigeria Forward
item.description: Presidential hopeful, Bola Ahmed Tinubu has revealed ways to move Nigeria forward amidst the economic issues facing the West African nation. In a tweet via his Twitter page on Wednesday, the former Lagos governor said the country can only move forward when there is religious tolerance and inter-faith harmony among the people. Tinubu advised Nigerians to tolerate each other’s religion, beliefs and reject all forms of discrimination dividing the country.

item.title: Why Does Easter's Date Change Every Year?
item.description: This Is Why Easter Never Seems to Be Celebrated on the Same Date Each YearBy Chris BarillaPublished Feb. 22 2022, 4:02 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIt's almost that time of year again: Easter is just around the corner! The yearly celebration may be known for its colorful decorations, egg hunts, and the promise of Spring to come, but if there's one other thing Easter is famous for, it's the fact that it is quite literally never on the same date from year to year.

item.description: The former Governor of Osun State, Olagunsoye Oyinlola and a chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party, Shuaibu Oyedokun have been appointed to lead a committee to resolve all grievances in the party ahead of the July 16 governorship election in Osun state. The spokesman of the party, Debo Ologunagba, disclosed this while addressing newsmen at the end of a joint meeting of its National Working Committee (NWC) and other National Stakeholders of the party.

item.title: The Big Bang Theory Actress Mayim Bialik to Be First Woman to Permanently Host Jeopardy!
item.description: Mayim Bialik has thrilled people who enjoyed watching her on The Big Bang Theory after it was announced that she will be the next permanent Jeopardy! show hostThe Wednesday announcement by the show's executive producer detailed that the 45-year-old will host prime-time and spin-off segmentsThe news, however, left fans with mixed reactions as some preferred a different candidate while others thought her academic excellence will serve the gaming show The Big Bang Theory actress Mayim Bialik has made history as the first female to be given a permanent host job on Jeopardy!

item.title: Unguwan Bulus In Kaduna Under Attack By Bandit Terrorists
item.description: Reports just reaching Naija News confirms that bandit terrorists are currently in the Unguwan Bulus and Sabon Tasha area of Kaduna State. The terrorists reportedly stormed the community at about 10:20 PM on Thursday night in their hundreds shooting sporadically at residents. “We are under attack presently in my neighbourhood in Kaduna. We have ran to safety,” one Bakuryok Tanjei confirmed the incident to Naija News. Though the resident had declined to speak further on the incident, more residents of the community have come on social media to report that they are currently running for safety as the terrorists are invading the community in huge numbers.

item.title: What Happened to Bello Nock? The Daredevil Clown Sustained an Injury
item.description: What happened to Bello Nock? The award-winning daredevil clown and circus performer was unable to perform on 'AGT' due to a horrible accident. Guinness World Record holder daredevil clown Bello Nock suffered an accident shortly before the first live show of America's Got Talent. As the showman revealed in a new Instagram post, he pinched a nerve in his back, making it impossible to take part in the spectacular routine he and his daughter, Annaliese (aka DareDaughter), devised specifically for the episode.

item.description: Joseph Aloba, the father of the late Nigerian singer, Oladimeji Ilerioluwa Aloba, popularly known as Mohbad, has raised suspicious questions concerning the death of his son. Naija News reports that Joseph, in a recent interview with TVC, said he met a large crowd at Mohbad’s house after his demise, including his PA, Darosha, Davido’s representative, Zlatan Ibile, Wunmi and her lawyer, and many others. The singer’s father stated that he was shocked when they said Mohbad had a thumbprint will, whereas he is 50 years old and has no will.

item.title: Kurt Cobain - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Singer and guitarist of the late 1980s, early 1990s grunge band Nirvana, best known for their breakthrough 1991 album Nevermind which featured the hit single "Smells Like Teen Spirit." After struggling with drugs and depression during the height of Nirvana's popularity, he tragically took his own life at the age of 27.  Before Fame He was so angry with the turmoil in his family that he lashed out at others, especially adults, and bullied a classmate at school.

item.title: South-West: Yoruba Leaders Sponsoring Crisis Over 2023 Elections Won't End Well
item.description: The Oluwo of Iwo, Oba Abdulrasheed Akanbi, on Sunday, called on Fulani herdsmen to live in the town rather than reside inside the bush so that everyone will know them. The monarch also called on Fulani resident in towns to fish out the criminals among them in the interest of peaceful co-existence. Oba Akanbi in a statement posted on his Facebook page, on Sunday, alleged that all security issues in the South-West are about the 2023 presidential election.

item.title: Atiku Should Step Down For Me Bala Mohammed
item.description: The presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party in the 2019 general elections, Atiku Abubakar has been called on by the Governor of Bauchi State, Bala Mohammed to step down for him in the 2023 race. According to Mohammed, he has the wealth of knowledge to rule Nigeria if he emerges as President of the country in 2023. Mohammed stated this while speaking on Channels TV on Sunday. The Bauchi State Governor when asked if he would step down for Atiku who has also expressed his intention to contest, Bala said: “why can’t Atiku step down for me”.

item.title: Guardiola Describes Man City's Club World Cup Final As "Once In A Lifetime" Chance
item.description: Manchester City manager, Pep Guardiola, has described his team’s qualification for the 2023 FIFA Club World Cup final as a “once-in-a-lifetime” opportunity. Guardiola and his boys, who were without their injured talisman, Erling Haaland, faced Japanese club, Urawa Red Diamonds in the semi-finals of the 2023 Club World Cup on Tuesday night, December 19. The Japanese team showed incredible defensive resilience right up to the end of the first half before defender Marius Hoibraten turned Matheus Nunes’ cross into his net.

item.title: Lagos PDP Congress Cancelled As Thugs Invade Venue
item.description: The Lagos State planned congress of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has been cancelled. Naija News understands that the cancellation was announced after some political thugs invaded the Tafawa Balewa Square, where the exercise had started on Saturday. State Congress Electoral Committee Chairman, Engr. Benson Abounu while declaring the cancellation, noted that the congress was disrupted by the hoodlums who came with weapons to cause unrest. It was alleged that the thugs invaded the venue of the congress with the intention of rigging the exercise.

item.title: Don't Lose Hope In Tinubu's Administration, CAN Tells Nigerians
item.description: The Christian Association of Nigeria (CAN) has encouraged Nigerians to maintain hope amid the economic reforms implemented by President Bola Tinubu‘s administration. The association urged the President to persist in the direction he has taken since assuming office almost eight months ago, expressing its support for the government. CAN President, Daniel Okoh, urged Nigerians not to lose hope but to have patience and persevere, acknowledging the efforts made by the President towards securing the nation.

item.title: Flutterwave Breaks New Record, Now Valued Above $3bn
item.description: Flutterwave on Wednesday (today) reported that the company is now worth over $3 billion. The development it said came to be after it raised another $250 million in Series D funding. The new funds according to the company will drive Flutterwave’s ambitious expansion plan to accelerate customer acquisition in existing markets and growth through M&A and develop complementary products while encouraging innovations in its products and services development. Naija News understands that the company now pride itself as it continues to transform the way Africans transact on the continent and worldwide.

item.title: Top Nigerian Newspaper Headlines For Today, Monday, 7th November 2022
item.description: Good morning Nigeria, welcome to Naija News roundup of top newspaper headlines in Nigeria for today, Monday, 7th November 2022 President Muhammadu Buhari has assured that his government is working hard to ensure adequate food for all Nigerians before he vacates office in 2023. More importantly, the number one citizen said Nigeria would be more united, prosperous, and secure than he met it when he took over the government in 2015.

item.title: What happened to Blaque? Where are the R&B group members today?
item.description: Netizens who are musically inclined will agree with some opinion shapers that there was something special about 90s R&B music. The lyrics were creative, the videos cheesy, and the dance moves fancy. Blaque is one of the R&B groups that were popular then. The group has undergone various changes, and netizens have been asking, ''What happened to Blaque?'' Since its formation, Blaque produced and released catchy single hits that made them a household name.

item.title: 2023: APC Has No Option But To Win 2023 Presidency
item.description: The National Chairman of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Abdullahi Adamu, says the party will do its best to ensure that it wins the 2023 presidential election. Naija News reports that Adamu said this on Thursday when he received Oluremi, the wife of the APC presidential candidate, Bola Tinubu, at the party’s National Secretariat in Abuja. The Senator was accompanied by Nana, wife of Kashim Shettima, the party’s vice-presidential candidate, and other women leaders of the party.

Naija News reports that the former lovebirds have been making headlines following Fancy’s public apology about their failed wedding which she later claimed Alex forced her to put up online. In the series of chats that emerged online, Fancy claimed everything seemed wrong in their relationship despite spending five years together.

item.title: Benin Govt Working With Nigerian Govt To Kill Igboho In Custody
item.description: The spokesperson of embattled Yoruba nation agitator, Sunday Adeyemo, popularly known as Sunday Igboho, Olayomi Koiki has alleged that the government of Benin Republic and the federal government of Nigeria are planning to kill his principal in custody. Koiki made the allegation on Tuesday during a podcast monitored by Naija News. According to him, the plan is to silence Igboho and other leaders of the Yoruba Nation agitation including Prof. Banji Akintoye.

item.description: Legendary singer-songwriter who revolutionized folk music in the 1960's with albums such as The Freewheelin' Bob Dylan, Highway 61 Revisited, and Blonde on Blonde and songs such as "The Times They Are a-Changin'," "Like a Rolling Stone," and "Positively 4th Street." Before Fame Born Robert Zimmerman, he changed his name to Dylan after the poet Dylan Thomas. He was born into a Jewish family, but later converted to Christianity. While studying at the University of Minnesota, he became more enthused with folk music than rock and roll.

item.title: Kalu Visits Nnamdi Kanu In DSS Custody, Shares Discussion
item.description: Former Abia State Governor, Sen. Orji Uzor Kalu revealed that he was at the office of the Department of State Services (DSS) on Monday to visit detained leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu. Naija News reports that the Chief Whip of the Nigerian Senate made public details of his discussion with Kanu on his verified Facebook page a few moments ago. Kalu said his visit to the office of the secret police was to encourage the embattled Biafran agitator to consider the consequences of certain actions and utterances for the sake of the Igbo people.

item.title: Mountain Monsters - Cast, Ages, Trivia
item.description: Originally airing on the Discovery Inc. subsidiary channel Destination America, the show followed the Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings team as they researched and found evidence of unidentified creatures in the Appalachian Mountains. Trivia The show also had a side-series titled Mountain Monsters: Uncaged. A fifth and final season aired in 2017 until the Travel Channel revived the show in 2019. Actor The show starred John Tice, Jacob Lowe, Joseph Lott, Jeff Headlee, Willy McQuillian and William Neff.

item.title: Why Tinubu Could Lose 2023 Presidential Election
item.description: A chieftain of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Professor Doknan Sheni, says the party’s candidate, Bola Ahmed Tinubu, could lose the 2023 presidential election. The leader of Christian members of the APC in the 19 states of the North stated this in an interview with Vanguard on Thursday in Abuja. Sheni said that the APC Presidential candidate could lose the 2023 presidency because of the Muslim-Muslim ticket controversy. He added that Tinubu’s decision could also cost the ruling party some political positions across the country in 2023.

item.title: Ahead of the 'This Is Us' Series Finale, Here Are 10 Memes to Soothe Your Soul

item.title: Kenya Red Cross contacts - Tuko.co.ke
item.description: Kenya Red Cross is a unit of International Red Cross and Red Crescent Movement society found in the world over. In Kenya, this association was built up in 1965. Kenya Red Cross has an objective to help and run different projects while bringing issues to light to the overall population with respect to current problems or issues that influence them. Example of such activities run or helped by the Red Cross Kenya are disaster management, blood services, famine, training administrations, and emergency services and in addition medical aid projects.

item.title: Ucho Ogbodo Recounts How Witches Threatened Her During Pregnancy
item.description: Popular Nigerian actress, Uche Ogbodo, on Thursday claimed that she received threats from witches during pregnancy. The actress took to her Instagram account to share a throwback video of herself working out with her massive baby bump. Ogbodo who disclosed that she has missed working out disclosed that immediately after the video, she got threats as regards her unborn child from witches. She thanked God for the successful birth of her child amid the threats.

Breaking News: Local Hunters, Soldiers Rescue Over 80 Girls Kidnapped In Borno
item.description: Over 80 students of the Government Girls’ Secondary School in Chibok Local Government Area of Borno State who were abducted by the dreaded Boko Haram sect have been reportedly rescued. According to report, the girls who were kidnapped during a raid by the insurgents on Monday night, April 14, 2014, were rescued on Tuesday and Wednesday morning by a group of vigilante, local hunters and soldiers. As fate would have it, after kidnapping the girls and putting them in tipper lorries, they got stuck in the bush while they were trying to crossover some muddy area between Chibok and Askira/Uba.

item.title: 2023: APC Founding Fathers Agreed Southerner Will Succeed Buhari
item.description: A former governor of Ogun State, Olusegun Osoba, has revealed that the founding fathers of the All Progressives Congress (APC) agreed in 2013 that a southerner will succeed President Muhammadu Buhari in 2023. Recall that the Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN), the Congress for Progressive Change (CPC) and a faction of the All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA) merged to form the APC. Speaking on Arise TV on Tuesday, Osoba said the agreement stated that after Buhari’s tenure, the next president will come from the south.

item.title: Afe Babalolas biography: the life and achievements of the Nigerian lawyer
item.description: Afe Babalola is among the most known lawyers in Nigeria and the founder of Afe Babalola University. Babalola has received several medals for being one of the highest contributors toward advancing and improving Nigeria's legal, health, agricultural, and education sectors. Afe Babalola has been an attorney in Nigeria for over 60 years. During this time, he has massively promoted the education and agricultural sectors.

item.title: Court Orders ASUU To Call Off Seven Months Strike
item.description: The Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) has been ordered to call off its nationwide industrial strike. The varsity staff union were ordered by the National Industrial Court of Nigeria (NICN) on Wednesday, September 21, to reopen all public universities and return to their duty posts after seven months of shutting down the learning institutions. Naija News understands that the NICN directive was coming following a petition before the court by the Minister of Labour and Employment, Dr Chris Ngige, on behalf of the federal government.

item.title: Ukraine Invasion: 'There Will Be Consequences If You Help Russia'
item.description: The United States of America has warned China that there will be consequences if they should provide support for Russia in the ongoing unrest in Ukraine. Jake Sullivan, White House National Security Adviser, stated that China providing Russia with support is a reason to be concerned. “We also are watching closely to see the extent to which China actually does provide any form of support, material support or economic support, to Russia.

item.title: "It Is Over For The PDP"

Imansuangbon made the submission on Friday in Abuja after he was presented with the membership card of Labour Party by the embattled National Chairman of LP, Julius Abure.

item.title: Dbanj Files Petition Against Do2dtun (Details)
item.description: Nigerian singer, D’banj has filed an application at an Abuja federal court for an injunction restraining his estranged brother-in-law, Do2dtun from making malicious and defamatory posts against him on social media. The entertainer filed the petition through one of his lawyers, Toheeb Lawal, Naija News learnt The Judge, Emmanuel Iyanna, gave the injunction on Wednesday, October 18, 2023, in the case with Motion No: MN/218/2023. In granting the application, which has D’banj as the complainant and Do2dtun as the respondent, Iyanna granted “an order restraining the defendant (Do2dtun) either by himself, servants, privies, cohorts, representatives, or any person deriving authority from him from further making any malicious, intimidating or defamatory post directing at the complainant (D’banj) on any social media platform (X, Instagram, etc) or news media pending the hearing and determination of the substantive case”.

item.description: While political parties are desperately preparing ahead and for the 2023 presidential elections, the Peoples Democratic Party are still in the puzzle of electing a National Chairman for the party. Naija News reports that the High Court of Rivers State in August 2021, stopped Prince Uche Secondus from parading himself as National Chairman or member of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). Hon. Justice O. Gbasam of the Degema Judicial Division Vacation Court sitting in Port Harcourt granted the injunction following a suit No: PHC/2183/CS/2021 filed by Ibeawuchi Ernest Alex, Dennis Nna Amadi, Emmanuel Stephen and Umezirike Onucha against Uche Secondus (1st defendant) and the PDP (2nd defendant).

item.title: Soyinka Reveals Position On Sunday Igboho, Blasts Buhari (Video)
item.description: Nobel Laureate, Professor Wole Soyinka has made his view on the actions of Yoruba activist, Sunday Igboho as regards Fulani herdsmen known. Soyinka in his submission noted that Igboho responded to a situation that pushed him to explosion point in the way he knew how, adding that whatever excesses or errors noticed in his actions is for others to help or correct him. The Professor noted that the most important thing is that Igboho was bold enough to respond to an unacceptable situation which has become a source of worry to many Nigerians.

item.title: Tara Reid - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Best known for playing Vicky in the American Pie films, she also had roles in Josie and the Pussycats, A Return to Salem's Lot, The Big Lebowski and Sharknado. Before Fame She appeared as a regular on the game show Child's Play when she was nine years old. Trivia She played the character Ashley in the soap opera Days of Our Lives in 1995. Family Life She was engaged to Carson Daly before splitting in June 2001. She was engaged to Michael Axtmann but the couple later split.

item.title: The New Ordinances in 'New Horizons' Give You More Control of Your Island
item.description: With the 2.0 update, players can now enact different ordinances on their island, giving them more control over their personal playstyle. Source: NintendoThe 2.0 update for Animal Crossing: New Horizons is out, and it comes with so many new features for players to use. In addition to The Roost and a cooking update, players can also enact ordinances on their island. There are four different ordinances you can enact on your island once it reaches a rating of 3 stars, giving you more control over the playstyle depending on your personal preferences.

item.title: TheOrionSound - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Musician, gamer and vlogger specializing in Minecraft and humorous original songs. He became known for his piano and vocal cover series "One-Take Tuesdays," his CrazyCraft Roleplay series, and his love of the "Cheeky Nandos." He has also been a part of the CrazyCraft 3.0 YouTuber server. item.title: Top Nigerian Newspaper Headlines For Today, Saturday, 5th June, 2021
item.description: Good morning Nigeria, welcome to Naija News roundup of top newspaper headlines in Nigeria for today Saturday, 5th June 2021. The Federal Government on Friday suspended, indefinitely, the operations of microblogging and social networking service, Twitter, in Nigeria. Naija News reports that the suspension of Twitter was made known in a post on Twitter. Nigeria’s Minister of Information and Culture, Lai Mohammed, announced the suspension in a statement signed by his media aide Segun Adeyemi.

item.title: We Can't Believe What the "Oops!... I Did It Again" Music Video Guy Is Doing Now
item.description: Britney Spears' 2000 music video is iconic — and so is the astronaut in it. But what is the "Oops!... I Did It Again" music video guy doing now? Source: YouTube"Oops! ... I Did It Again" is among Britney Spears' most iconic singles — and the accompanying video was pretty epic, too. The 2000 masterpiece featured at 19-year-old Britney as a sexy alien serenading a hunky astronaut. And who could forget when that astronaut took off his helmet and then gifted Britney the Titanic necklace?

item.title: What Movies Is Terry Bradshaw In? He's Been in Several TV Shows and Films
item.description: Terry Bradshaw is an NFL icon and the star of the reality series 'The Bradshaw Bunch,' but he was in movies and other TV shows too, so what are they? Source: Getty ImagesIt's not uncommon for star athletes to make the leap from sports to television or even movies at some point. Just look at Michael Jordan in Space Jam or LeBron James in the *other* Space Jam. Admittedly, sometimes it works out and other times it doesn't.

item.title: Zulum Speaks On 'Rewarding' Repentant Boko Haram Members
item.description: Governor Babagana Zulum of Borno State has said that his administration will not be giving any money to repentant terrorists for giving up their arms and surrendering to the military. Naija News had reported that no fewer than 1,000 Boko Haram members laid down their arms and surrendered to Nigerian troops. A statement by the army spokesperson, Onyema Nwachukwu, said the repentant terrorists will be processed and passed on to the relevant government agencies for further assessment in line with extant provisions.
